name: harmonically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to harmony (= a pleasant musical sound made by different notes being played or sung at the same time) or to music that sounds pleasing: The composer's concertos are harmonically complex and not easy for even skilled musicians to play. The songs on the record are harmonically rich and show off the range of the singer's powerful voice. Related word
harmony
More examplesFewer examplesThe young band is still not very advanced harmonically, but they practice their instruments and get slowly better every day. The third movement contains a beautiful violin solo that ascends harmonically into a stunning climax.
